tasks.description: Regularly update and synchronize the API list with script functionalities for efficient integration.
Adopt systematic revision and versioning, using semantic versioning and documenting changes.
Prepare environment and prerequisites for structured testing with the ICSR method.
Execute testing scripts as per the ICSR method.
Analyze outcomes for adjustments after testing scripts execution.
Engage in feedback loops and seek milestone approvals using real-time feedback channels.
Incorporate the `skeleton.md` into development, ensuring script functions mirror the skeleton list for project fidelity.
Systematically refactor and test, guided by `skeleton.md` and iterative feedback, focusing on native system functionalities.
